name: KEM Alpha 1
description: You get a call to go to your friend's house, but there is no sign of him whatsoever, and everything is locked up. So, you get into the house and things then start to take a horrible turn and you realize that you are not alone. Solve puzzles, open locked doors, turn the lights on, and grab your flashlight. Oh, and grab some batteries too, your going to need them.
